New Content (PEN, Labs, and Formulas)

Enteral nutrition has been added to the PEN page, and PN will be added soon.

Formulas have been updated to include some of the most common, as well as what I came across while combing through the PEN notes. More will be added as they are encountered in the notes.

Lab Values has been updated to hold common labs, and similarly to Formulas, I will update the labs as I encounter more throughout the notes.

Section headings for the disease/condition notes are now collapsable, tap/click to expand or contract them.

Lastly, feel free to report errors or suggestions on About by following the links.
